meanings.sent1: The statue had the bronziest finish of all.
meanings.sent2: Her hair shone with the bronziest hue.
meanings.sent3: The bronziest trophy was awarded to the smallest competitor.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun cast the bronziest glow over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The bronziest bell rang with a deep resonance.

meanings.definition: Having the most bronze color or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The bronziest medal was proudly displayed on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had the bronziest frame.
meanings.sent3: The bronziest paint color made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had the bronziest tone, filling the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The bronziest leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
